SYSTEM: AMPER08_-_RDF%28S%29_access_APIs.pdf: Página 4
RDF(S) Access APIs, May 2008
4
© García-Castro, Corcho, Muñoz-García
Jena
• Java framework for building Semantic Web 
applications
• Open source software from HP Labs:
• The Jena framework includes:
– A RDF API
– An OWL API
– Reading and writing RDF in RDF/XML, N3 and N-Triples
– In-memory and persistent storage
– A rule based inference engine
– SPARQL query engine
speaker: SYSTEM
